definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Dongpo pork shoulder, traditional dish said to have been created by Northern Song dynasty writer Su Dongpo 蘇東坡|苏东坡

sentences.english: It's physically impossible for you to lick your elbow.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能舔到你自己的肘子。

sentences.english: Its a reason why people say deke has sharp elbows.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼大家說大叔有很厲害的肘子。

sentences.english: Then when he turned around his elbow smacked into my nose causing it to break.
sentences.chinese: 然後他回頭的時候肘子杵斷了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: If you don't have a tissue, use your upper arm or crook of your elbow.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有餐巾紙，用前手臂或肘子擋住。

definition: pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
to stew in soy sauce and spices
